title: Tempest Conquers: Indian Airpower
description: Combining foreign procurements with homegrown solutions, the Indian Air Force features over 2,000 active fixed-wing and rotary-wing aircraft at its disposal.

title: Land of the Gods: Indian Ground Forces
description: Heavy armor and ranged artillery is key to the armored spearhead that is the Indian Army and its mobile fighting brigades.

title: Varuna Calls: the Indian Navy
description: The Indian Navy oversees some 260 total active hulls led by aircraft carriers, attack submarines, and guided-missile surface combatants.

title: Hunter-Seekers: Indian Drone Power
description: As the importance of over-battlefield unmanned systems continues to grow globally, the Indian military continues to built up its drone force.

title: Men-at-Arms: Indian Military Ranks
description: Influenced by British military structure, the modern Indian military organizes under a pattern common to Western fighting forces.

title: Homeland Defense: Indian Manpower
description: The nation of India has one of the largest populations on the planet allowing it to field one of the largest militaries in turn.
